pull.title: refactor: Use type-safe time in txorphanage
pull.body: This allows to remove manual conversions like multiplication by `60`, and uses a type-safe type instead of a raw `int64_t`.

comments.body: Out of scope for this PR but this global is probably the source of instability in the txorphan harness.
